title: Language Networks in the Brain, Chomsky's, Universal Grammar, Language vs. Thought
description:
Neuroscientist Dr. Ev Fedorenko discusses language networks in the brain, the extent to which these networks are specifically dedicated to language, whether Chomsky's theory of "Universal Grammar" is empirically supported, and more.

*This content is never meant to serve as medical advice.
